boolShell

Class Formular

  • java.lang.Object
    • boolShell.Formular
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    And, Not, Or, Reference, Value, Variable

    public abstract class Formular
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for all Formulars Supports generall validation-method which creates the right Formular out of the command e.g. Variable, Value or Reference
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Field Detail

      • childs

        public Formular[] childs
        Contains all child-formulars of every formular e.g. And has 2 child-formulars

      • parent

        public Formular parent
        Contains the parent-formular of every formular e.g. And is the parent of its 2 child-formulars
